name: Skins For Battle Royale
description:
All season skins for Battle Royale. Skins, Battle Royale Skins! The best skins for Fort!
- All Season Battle Royale Skins
- Dance Emotes Battle Challenge for BATTLE ROYALE
- Dances Emotes
- Download the App now and enjoy all the SKINS!

In this App you will be able to find all Battle Royale SKINS, updated at the moment with the new updates. We work daily to include in our App all the Skins that are coming out in the official store of this great game. Emotes battle royale

We have also added all the cosmetics of the set of each Battle Royale Skin, so you can see which peak, backpack, glider, dance or any cosmetic that is part of the set of all available Skins. dances emotes battle royale

FEATURES :
* All seasons and all types of outfits : Legendary Skins, Epic Skins , Rare Skins ,Uncommon skins
* You will find the best Masks, Peaks, Characters, Backpacks, Paragliding and Dances .
* + 200 Skins Available
* SKINS DE FBR
* Simple and Easy application
* Completely Free Application!
* Update Season 6. Including the new skins: Calamity, DJ Yonder, Giddy-Up, Fable, Dusk, Nightshade and Dire.

Download the App now and enjoy all the SKINS! Enjoy it!!
